title: Who was the first vice president to succeed a president who died while in office? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: That would be John “His Accidency” Tyler, who assumed the presidency on April 4 (with Congress passing a resolution on April 6 stating “Yes, he really is the president, and not just the VP acting as president”), 1841, following the death in office of William Henry Harrison.
